body_html: I'd like to apply LayerNorm to multi-layer LSTM but have no idea how to use LSTMCell classes. @SsnL, could you let me know any simple example for this? LayerNorm is quite new to PyTorch so it is difficult to find a good example for this..

body: I'd like to apply LayerNorm to multi-layer LSTM but have no idea how to use LSTMCell classes. @SsnL, could you let me know any simple example for this? LayerNorm is quite new to PyTorch so it is difficult to find a good example for this..
